description: Resets the password for any user in your Managed Microsoft AD or Simple AD directory. Disabled users will become enabled and can be authenticated following the API call. You can reset the password for any user in your directory with the following exceptions:

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Managed Microsoft AD or Simple AD directory in which the user resides.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The user name of the user whose password will be reset.

parameters.name: NewPassword
parameters.description: The new password that will be reset.
